Instruction: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Prepare a 9-inch cake pan by greasing it.

Blend milk, sugar, eggs, Parmesan cheese, and butter in a blender until smooth, about 5 minutes. Then add coconut, cornmeal, and flour; blend until creamy. Incorporate baking powder and salt, blending until smooth. Pour the mixture into the prepared cake pan.
Bake in the preheated oven until the top turns golden brown and the edges start to pull away from the pan, approximately 30 minutes.
Substitute a different cheese for the Parmesan if preferred.
